entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
